short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: NCDownloader extension for Chrome. PLEASE log in to use context menu and url download.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
NCDownloader extension for Chrome.

Requirements:
NextCloud access
NCDownloader plugin installed in NextCloud

1. Login with your NextCloud site and account
2. Right-click link -> Send to NCDownloader OR Click extension icon -> Paste url -> Download
3. Download should be started in your NCDownloader dashboard
